name: Fallen London: Older, Not Wiser
storyline: Terror hits London! A team of crack cat-burglars menaces the city by night, making off with all manner of valuables. The constables are baffled: no one can identify a single suspect. Who are these mystery criminals? And why do they leave behind a scent distinctly redolent of peach?
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for November, 2020.
